  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: add new 'all matches with same name' option and fix menu option for blixem.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: add col name to menu title, fix compiler warning.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: add data/funcs to support reporting the index of a feature subpart (exon etc).zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c
  • src/: zmapControl/zmapControlWindowInfoPanel.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: add data/funcs to support reporting the index of a feature subpart (exon etc).
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: fix compiler warning.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: add code to store subpart (exon etc) index to subpart data on canvas item.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c: add data/funcs to support reporting the index of a feature subpart (exon etc).

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/blxview.c, w9/translate.c, wmake/truemake: remove dependence on translate.c by giface, move sortValues() to it can be linked to blxNN progs.
  • w6/smap.c: fix bad bug in composemaps where it actually concatenates butting segments but forgets to check if but in the match and ref. sequences !
  • w7/smapconvert.c: fix stupid bug in out of date seg array pointer.
  • w9/blxview.c: Fixed a bug where pfetch was not working when second-clicking on a highlighted row
  • w7/method.c, wh/method.h: add support for new gap tags for display/processing of gapped aligns.
  • w9/blxview.c: Further small fix to do with pfetching selected sequences
  • wspec/models.wrm: add support for new gap tags for display/processing of gapped aligns and align strings.
  • w7/fmap_.h: remove redundant gap string format data.
  • w7/fmapfeatures.c: alter code to use new gap display tag.
  • w7/fmapsegdump.c: change code to use method cache more, change code to use new gap string tags.
  • wh/smap.h: add dec for func to get align string from an object.
  • w6/smap_.h: tidy up align string functions and add new one to fetch the align string.
  • w6/smap.c: simplify handling or string vs. coord aligns, add function to get string.
  • w6/smapgapped.c: remove bad bug that erroneously joined align gaps, add function to get aligh string.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: make this use the method cache, much better, make code use new gap tags.
  • wh/smap.h: fix missing comment delimiter.
  • w9/blxview.c: Fixed a bug with the statistics dialog that was causing a crash when compiled with GTK v2.18
  • w9/blxparser.c: fix bug where we don't correct that sequence in seqbl file is too short for coords given.
